summary.span: 代表與 相關聯的參數以及其與 中資料行之個別對應的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters associated with a and their respective mappings to columns in a .

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當命令包含特定的 SQL 陳述式，而不是預存程序名稱的集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字內的參數預留位置的數字，或 SQL Server 就會引發錯誤。If the command contains an ad hoc SQL statement, as opposed to a stored-procedure name, the number of the parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or SQL Server raises an error. 預存程序，必須提供所有預存程序，沒有預設值所宣告的參數。With a stored procedure, all the parameters declared in the stored procedure without a default value must be provided. 使用預設值宣告的參數是選擇性的。Parameters declared with a default value are optional. 這可讓您指定預設以外的值。This lets you specify a value other than the default. 如需示範如何使用參數的其他範例程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[命令和參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md)。For more information with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體透過集合。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection. 參數用來選取資料來源中的資料並填入。The parameters are used to select data within the data source and populate the . 此程式碼假設和已經建立具有適當的結構描述、 命令及連線。This code assumes that a and a have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

新的 物件。
A new object.
使用這個 方法的多載指定整數參數值時，請特別小心。
Use caution when you are using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values.
由於這個多載接受 型別的 ，因此您必須在值為零時將整數值轉換成 型別，如下面的 C# 範例所示。
Because this overload takes a of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```
如果您沒有執行這個轉換，編譯器會假設您正在嘗試呼叫 (、) 多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the (, ) overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取代`SqlParameterCollection.Add`採用方法和。 replaces the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` method that takes a and an . 多載`Add`採用字串和物件已被取代，因為可能模稜兩可，與`SqlParameterCollection.Add`採用多載和而傳遞的字串與整數可能有的列舉值解譯為參數值或對應值。The overload of `Add` that takes a string and an object was deprecated because of possible ambiguity with the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` overload that takes a and a enumeration value where passing an integer with the string could be interpreted as being either the parameter value or the corresponding value. 使用每當您想要藉由指定其名稱和值加入參數。Use whenever you want to add a parameter by specifying its name and value. 如`Xml`列舉值，您可以使用字串時，XML 值，衍生類型執行個體，或物件。For `Xml` enumeration values, you can use a string, an XML value, an derived type instance, or a object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 `AddWithValue` 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the `AddWithValue` method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立提供 output 參數中傳回結果的預存程序的輸入的參數的物件。The following example demonstrates creating objects to supply an input parameter to a stored procedure that returns results in an output parameter. 程式碼會逐一中的項目並顯示在主控台視窗中的某些參數屬性。The code iterates through the items in the and displays some parameter properties in the console window. 這個範例假設的有效連接字串**AdventureWorks**範例資料庫的執行個體上[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。This example assumes a valid connection string to the **AdventureWorks** sample database on an instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameterCollection.Parent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameterCollection.Parent Example/CS/source.cs#1)]

span.span: The specified index does not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter this[string parameterName] { get; set; }
